resources.string: Walang ads, walang suskripsyon; ngunit open source at pasyon.
You have a Lifetime Patron account. That\'s pretty awesome!
Ikaw ay mayroong Patron account hanggang %s
Kung hindi binago, ikaw ay babalik sa free.
We rely on support from people like you to make it possible. If you enjoy using Lishogi, please consider supporting us by donating and becoming a Patron!

If you want to support Lishogi and open source development, consider donating! You will not get anything in return, because Lishogi treats all users equally, but your donation will be very appreciated!
Magbayad ng %s nang isang beses. Maging isang Lishogi Patron habang buhay.
Recurring billing, renewing your Patron wings every month.
A single donation that grants you the Patron wings for one month.
Please enter an amount in USD
Kami ay isang maliit na grupo lamang kaya\'t ang iyong suporta ay nakakatulong nang sobra para sa amin!
The celebrated Patrons who make Lishogi possible
Can I change/cancel my monthly support?
Yes, at any time, from PayPal or Patreon page. Or you can %s.
Are some features reserved to Patrons?
No, because Lishogi is entirely free, forever, and for everyone. That\'s a promise. However, Patrons get bragging rights with a cool new profile icon.
You support lishogi.org with %s per month.
Thank you very much for your help. You rock!
Decide what Lishogi is worth to you:
Withdraw your credit card and stop payments:
Tingnan ang iba pang Lishogi Patrons
Your transaction has been completed, and a receipt for your donation has been emailed to you.
You now have a permanent Patron account.
Ikaw ay isa nang Lishogi Patron nang habang buhay!
Ikaw ay isa nang Lishogi Patron para sa isang buwan!
Sa loob ng isang buwan, ikaw ay HINDI na sisingilin muli, at ang iyong Lishogi account ay babalik bilang isang regular na account.
